info.sourceTextContent: He hecho algunos viages, y he visto otros mortales muy inferiores a nosotros, y otros que nos son muy superiores; mas ningunos he visto que no tengan mas deseos que verdaderas necesidades, y mas necesidades que satisfacciones.
info.suspiciousTextContent: I have made a number of voyages, and I have seen others considerably inferior to us mortals, and others very much superior, but I have never encounter any whose desires exceeded their genuine needs, and whose satisfactions exceeded their needs
